Author: stegasaurus-
Text: I relate sooo much to the binging seeming like a distant memory when it’s been a while. i’ll literally go months, i’ll think about it sometimes and feel disgusted and in disbelief at the amount of food I used to eat all in one go. and i fantasise about it even though I sure as shit am not gonna actually do it, until I do. and then it’s all I do for weeks. Like you open the gate a tiny bit for one binge to come through and they all just barge in and knock you over.   idk what the point of my comment is, I can just really identify with your post
